title: Old Kent Estate: All-inclusive dining
description: Enter a world of timeless elegance and classic style at the charming Old Kent Estate. The sense and sensibility of this lush 200-acre coffee plantation in the serene hills of Coorg is an alluring blend of British heritage and Indian charm. Magnificent grounds, home to a wide variety of flora and fauna, surround the individual cottages and the stately Old Kent Lodge. While its resplendent architecture is visibly tethered to its colonial past, modern luxury is assured with complimentary Wi-Fi access, cable TV on flatscreens, a spa and a games room. Stay for four days / three nights with daily breakfasts, three-course lunches and dinners, and more for two adults. Plus two children aged five and under stay free.
